snippet.title: Hollow Knight: Beneath and Beyond Trailer
snippet.description:
Descend into Hallownest, a vast ancient kingdom fallen to ruin. Explore its darkest corners and discover sights of surreal beauty but prepare yourself for the dark secrets buried within.

Hollow Knight is coming to PC, Mac, Linux and the Wii U in 2016. For more info check out: http://www.hollowknight.com

The game is being developed by Team Cherry. Find out about the team here: http://www.teamcherry.com.au

Hollow Knight's sound and score are created by Christopher Larkin. That includes the music in this trailer. To hear more of his work visit: http://www.composerlarkin.com
